items.sentence: I got a puppy from my father for my birthday.
I'll take care of your cat while you're away.
I've spent the last few days in the hospital.
Tom and Mary were very pleased with the gift.
I'll talk to Tom about what needs to be done.
I'll have to finish this work by next Monday.
I'll do that if both Tom and Mary want me to.
I'll do that if Tom and Mary both want me to.
I'll be making more money than Tom this year.
I'll help you as soon as I finish doing this.
I'll do that whether I get permission or not.
Tom didn't appreciate what we'd done for him.
It looks like this door has been forced open.
Tom doesn't have to speak French for his job.
We thought that Tom's threat was only a joke.
It seems obvious that Tom isn't able to swim.
Tom is one of the safest drivers that I know.
They were staring at us, like we were aliens.
Mr. Jackson was our substitute teacher today.
Every seven years we let the land lie fallow.
